onstart: @EOS1BOT is a powerful tool with which you can receive instant notifications about selected activity in the blockchain. From tracking payments to finding bugs in smart contracts 1. Don't send me private keys! They just aren't needed 2. Send me any EOS PUBLIC Key - and bot will show all accounts with this key 3. Send any login e.g., @eosio.token - bot shows information about this actor + some history 4. Send block number starting with letter "b" e.g., b123 - bot will show you block 123 from EOS Mainnet 5. üî• Use the power of RegExp /keywords allow you to provide flexible patterns and regular expressions - then you will receive instant notifications with an raw action if it has a keyword or RegExp üåÄ Work in progress New functions and notifications with more readable format üññContact & Support @chain_cf chat @cryptoporn chat @vikxx pm github.com/vikxx steemit.com/@vikx golos.io/@vik
